special_powers.description: Improved Movement: Hindering. When Piledriver occupies a Debris marker, he can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.
Sidestep, Stealth. Improved Movement: Elevated but only to move to a lower elevation.
Improved Movement: Hindering. When Bulldozer occupies a Debris marker, he can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.
FREE: Choose an adjacent friendly character.  That character can use Improved Targeting: Hindering this turn.
Charge, Leap/Climb.  When Troll uses Charge, she can use Improved Movement: Elevated, Hindering, Outdoor Blocking, Move Through.

Perplex, but only to target Tyrannoid bystanders. When Tyrranus uses it, he can use Improved Targeting: Characters and modifies the same combat value on all friendly Tyrranoid bystanders within range and line of fire.
Improved Movement: Hindering. When Wrecker occupies a Debris marker, he can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.

Charge. When Hulk uses it, he can use Improved Movement: Destroy Blocking and, after resolutions he may make a close attack targeting each character that has "giant damage symbol" or "colossal damage symbol" he moved through, regardless of adjacency. Hit characters are dealt 3 penetrating damage instead of normal damage.
Improved Movement: Hindering. When Thunderball occupies a Debris marker, he can't be targeted by opposing characters 5 or more squares away.
Unworthy Thor starts the game with TMT #s013 Jarnbjorn equipped.
Improved Movement: Hindering, Improved Targeting: Hindering. Unworthy Thor's range value is 7.
[Wing Symbol], Sidestep.  Valkyrie can only carry characters that share a keyword with her.
At the end of your turn, choose one: Give an adjacent opposing character an action token, -or- Give each adjacent opposing character that's lower points an action token.
